        function calculateComparisonMetrics(transfer1, transfer2) {
            // Extract fee values for comparison
            const fee1 = extractFeeValue(transfer1.fee);
            const fee2 = extractFeeValue(transfer2.fee);
            
            // Generate realistic metrics
            const player1Metrics = {
                marketValue: generateMarketValue(fee1),
                age: Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 20, // 20-30 years
                contractLength: `${Math.floor(Math.random() * 4) + 2} years`,
                valueRating: Math.min(95, Math.max(60, (fee1 / 100) * 100 + Math.random() * 20)),
                marketImpact: Math.min(95, Math.max(50, fee1 + Math.random() * 30))
            };
            
            const player2Metrics = {
                marketValue: generateMarketValue(fee2),
                age: Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 20,
                contractLength: `${Math.floor(Math.random() * 4) + 2} years`,
                valueRating: Math.min(95, Math.max(60, (fee2 / 100) * 100 + Math.random() * 20)),
                marketImpact: Math.min(95, Math.max(50, fee2 + Math.random() * 30))
            };
            
            // Determine winner and verdict
            const verdict = determineWinner(transfer1, transfer2, player1Metrics, player2Metrics, fee1, fee2);
            
            return {
                player1: player1Metrics,
                player2: player2Metrics,
                verdict: verdict,
                feeDifference: Math.abs(fee1 - fee2) > 0 ? `£${Math.abs(fee1 - fee2)}M` : 'Same',
                bestValue: player1Metrics.valueRating > player2Metrics.valueRating ? transfer1.player : transfer2.player
            };
        }

        function extractFeeValue(feeString) {
            if (feeString.toLowerCase().includes('loan') || feeString.toLowerCase().includes('free')) {
                return 0;
            }
            const match = feeString.match(/£([\d.]+)M?/);
            return match ? parseFloat(match[1]) : Math.random() * 50 + 10;
        }

        function generateMarketValue(fee) {
            const variance = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 20; // ±10M variance
            const marketValue = Math.max(5, fee + variance);
            return `£${marketValue.toFixed(1)}M`;
        }

        function determineWinner(transfer1, transfer2, metrics1, metrics2, fee1, fee2) {
            const score1 = metrics1.valueRating + metrics1.marketImpact - (fee1 * 0.5);
            const score2 = metrics2.valueRating + metrics2.marketImpact - (fee2 * 0.5);
            
            if (Math.abs(score1 - score2) < 10) {
                return {
                    winner: 'Close Match',
                    reason: 'Both transfers offer similar value proposition'
                };
            }
            
            if (score1 > score2) {
                return {
                    winner: `${transfer1.player} Wins`,
                    reason: 'Better value for money and market impact'
                };
            } else {
                return {
                    winner: `${transfer2.player} Wins`,
                    reason: 'Superior market value and investment potential'
                };
            }
        }

        function generateComparisonCharts(transfer1, transfer2, metrics) {
            // Fee Comparison Chart
            const feeCtx = document.getElementById('fee-comparison-chart');
            if (feeCtx) {
                createBarChart(feeCtx, {
                    labels: [transfer1.player, transfer2.player],
                    data: [extractFeeValue(transfer1.fee), extractFeeValue(transfer2.fee)],
                    colors: ['#ffd700', '#4a2c7a']
                });
            }
            
            // Value Trend Chart
            const valueCtx = document.getElementById('value-trend-chart');
            if (valueCtx) {
                createLineChart(valueCtx, {
                    labels: ['Initial', 'Current', 'Projected'],
                    datasets: [
                        {
                            label: transfer1.player,
                            data: [
                                extractFeeValue(transfer1.fee) * 0.8,
                                extractFeeValue(transfer1.fee),
                                extractFeeValue(transfer1.fee) * 1.2
                            ],
                            color: '#ffd700'
                        },
                        {
                            label: transfer2.player,
                            data: [
                                extractFeeValue(transfer2.fee) * 0.8,
                                extractFeeValue(transfer2.fee),
                                extractFeeValue(transfer2.fee) * 1.2
                            ],
                            color: '#4a2c7a'
                        }
                    ]
                });
            }
        }

        function createBarChart(canvas, data) {
            const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
            const maxValue = Math.max(...data.data);
            const padding = 40;
            const barWidth = (canvas.width - padding * 2) / data.data.length - 20;
            
            ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
            
            data.data.forEach((value, index) => {
                const barHeight = (value / maxValue) * (canvas.height - padding * 2);
                const x = padding + index * (barWidth + 20);
                const y = canvas.height - padding - barHeight;
                
                // Create gradient
                const gradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, y, 0, y + barHeight);
                gradient.addColorStop(0, data.colors[index]);
                gradient.addColorStop(1, data.colors[index] + '80');
                
                ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
                ctx.fillRect(x, y, barWidth, barHeight);
                
                // Add labels
                ctx.fillStyle = '#333';
                ctx.font = '12px Arial';
                ctx.textAlign = 'center';
                ctx.fillText(data.labels[index], x + barWidth / 2, canvas.height - 10);
                ctx.fillText(`£${value}M`, x + barWidth / 2, y - 5);
            });
        }

        function createLineChart(canvas, data) {
            const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
            const padding = 40;
            const width = canvas.width - padding * 2;
            const height = canvas.height - padding * 2;
            
            ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
            
            const maxValue = Math.max(...data.datasets.flatMap(d => d.data));
            const pointWidth = width / (data.labels.length - 1);
            
            data.datasets.forEach((dataset, datasetIndex) => {
                ctx.strokeStyle = dataset.color;
                ctx.lineWidth = 3;
                ctx.beginPath();
                
                dataset.data.forEach((value, index) => {
                    const x = padding + index * pointWidth;
                    const y = padding + height - (value / maxValue) * height;
                    
                    if (index === 0) {
                        ctx.moveTo(x, y);
                    } else {
                        ctx.lineTo(x, y);
                    }
                    
                    // Draw points
                    ctx.save();
                    ctx.fillStyle = dataset.color;
                    ctx.beginPath();
                    ctx.arc(x, y, 4, 0, Math.PI * 2);
                    ctx.fill();
                    ctx.restore();
                });
                
                ctx.stroke();
            });
            
            // Add labels
            ctx.fillStyle = '#333';
            ctx.font = '12px Arial';
            ctx.textAlign = 'center';
            data.labels.forEach((label, index) => {
                const x = padding + index * pointWidth;
                ctx.fillText(label, x, canvas.height - 10);
            });
        }

        function exportComparison(player1, player2) {
            const comparisonData = {
                title: `Transfer Comparison: ${player1} vs ${player2}`,
                timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
                url: window.location.href
            };
            
            const dataStr = JSON.stringify(comparisonData, null, 2);
            const dataUri = 'data:application/json;charset=utf-8,'+ encodeURIComponent(dataStr);
            
            const exportFileDefaultName = `transfer-comparison-${player1.replace(/\s+/g, '-')}-vs-${player2.replace(/\s+/g, '-')}.json`;
            
            const linkElement = document.createElement('a');
            linkElement.setAttribute('href', dataUri);
            linkElement.setAttribute('download', exportFileDefaultName);
            linkElement.click();
            
            showNotification('Comparison data exported! 📄', 'success');
        }

        function filterTimelineEvents(period) {
            const now = Date.now();
            let filteredEvents = [...allTimelineEvents];
            
            switch(period) {
                case 'today':
                    filteredEvents = allTimelineEvents.filter(event => 
                        now - event.timestamp < (24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
                    );
                    break;
                case 'week':
                    filteredEvents = allTimelineEvents.filter(event => 
                        now - event.timestamp < (7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
                    );
                    break;
                case 'month':
                    filteredEvents = allTimelineEvents.filter(event => 
                        now - event.timestamp < (30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
                    );
                    break;
                default:
                    filteredEvents = allTimelineEvents;
            }
            
            renderTimelineEvents(filteredEvents);
        }

        function renderTimelineEvents(events) {

                return;
            }
            
            timelineEvents.innerHTML = events.map((event, index) => `
                <div class="timeline-event" style="animation-delay: ${index * 0.1}s">
                    <div class="timeline-event-content ${event.priority}">
                        <div class="timeline-meta">
                            <span class="timeline-time">${event.time}</span>
                            <span class="timeline-priority ${event.priority}">${event.priority.toUpperCase()}</span>
                        </div>

                                </button>
                            </div>

                    </div>
                    <div class="timeline-event-dot ${event.priority}"></div>

            `).join('');
            
            showNotification(`Timeline updated: ${events.length} events shown`, 'info');
        }

        function shareTimelineEvent(title) {
            const shareText = `🚨 Transfer Update: ${title}`;
            if (navigator.share) {
                navigator.share({
                    title: 'EPL Transfer Update',
                    text: shareText,
                    url: window.location.href
                });
            } else {
                navigator.clipboard.writeText(`${shareText} - ${window.location.href}`);
                showNotification('Timeline event copied to clipboard!', 'success');
            }
        }

        // Advanced Filters with Live Search
        function setupAdvancedFilters() {
            const panel = document.getElementById('advanced-filters-panel');
            const minValue = document.getElementById('min-value');
            const maxValue = document.getElementById('max-value');
            const minDisplay = document.getElementById('min-value-display');
            const maxDisplay = document.getElementById('max-value-display');
            const minAge = document.getElementById('min-age');
            const maxAge = document.getElementById('max-age');
            const leagueFilter = document.getElementById('league-filter');
            const contractFilters = panel.querySelectorAll('input[type="checkbox"]');
            
            // Range slider functionality
            function updateRangeValues() {
                const min = parseInt(minValue.value);
                const max = parseInt(maxValue.value);
                
                minDisplay.textContent = min === 0 ? '£0M' : `£${min}M`;
                maxDisplay.textContent = max === 100 ? '£100M+' : `£${max}M`;
                
                // Apply live filtering
                applyAdvancedFilters();
            }
            
            // Apply filters functionality
            function applyAdvancedFilters() {
                const filters = {
                    minValue: parseInt(minValue.value),
                    maxValue: parseInt(maxValue.value),
                    minAge: parseInt(minAge.value),
                    maxAge: parseInt(maxAge.value),
                    leagues: Array.from(leagueFilter.selectedOptions).map(option => option.value),
                    contractStatus: Array.from(contractFilters).filter(cb => cb.checked).map(cb => cb.value)
                };
                
                filterTransfersAdvanced(filters);
                saveFilterPreferences(filters);
            }
            
            // Event listeners
            minValue.addEventListener('input', updateRangeValues);
            maxValue.addEventListener('input', updateRangeValues);
            minAge.addEventListener('change', applyAdvancedFilters);
            maxAge.addEventListener('change', applyAdvancedFilters);
            leagueFilter.addEventListener('change', applyAdvancedFilters);
            contractFilters.forEach(cb => cb.addEventListener('change', applyAdvancedFilters));
            
            // Apply and Reset buttons
            const applyBtn = panel.querySelector('.apply-filters-btn');
            const resetBtn = panel.querySelector('.reset-filters-btn');
            
            applyBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                applyAdvancedFilters();
                showNotification('Advanced filters applied! 🔍', 'success');
            });
            
            resetBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                resetAdvancedFilters();
                showNotification('Filters reset to default', 'info');
            });
            
            // Load saved preferences
            loadFilterPreferences();
            updateRangeValues();
        }

        function filterTransfersAdvanced(filters) {
            const allTransferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
            let visibleCount = 0;
            
            allTransferCards.forEach(card => {
                const playerName = card.querySelector('.player-name').textContent;
                const feeText = card.querySelector('.transfer-fee').textContent;
                const fee = extractFeeValue(feeText);
                
                // Generate mock data for filtering
                const mockAge = Math.floor(Math.random() * 15) + 18; // 18-33
                const isVisible = 
                    fee >= filters.minValue && 
                    fee <= filters.maxValue &&
                    mockAge >= filters.minAge &&
                    mockAge <= filters.maxAge;
                
                if (isVisible) {
                    card.style.display = 'block';
                    card.style.opacity = '1';
                    card.style.transform = 'scale(1)';
                    visibleCount++;
                } else {
                    card.style.opacity = '0.3';
                    card.style.transform = 'scale(0.95)';
                }
            });
            
            // Update filter results indicator
            updateFilterResultsIndicator(visibleCount, allTransferCards.length);
        }

        function updateFilterResultsIndicator(visible, total) {
            let indicator = document.querySelector('.filter-results-indicator');
            if (!indicator) {
                indicator = document.createElement('div');
                indicator.className = 'filter-results-indicator';
                indicator.style.cssText = `
                    position: fixed; bottom: 20px; left: 20px; z-index: 1000;
                    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a, #6b4c9a); color: white;
                    padding: 12px 20px; border-radius: 25px; font-weight: 600;
                    box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(74, 44, 122, 0.3);
                    transition: all 0.3s ease;
                `;
                document.body.appendChild(indicator);
            }
            
            indicator.textContent = `${visible} of ${total} transfers match your filters`;
            indicator.style.display = visible === total ? 'none' : 'block';
        }

        function resetAdvancedFilters() {
            const panel = document.getElementById('advanced-filters-panel');
            panel.querySelector('#min-value').value = 0;
            panel.querySelector('#max-value').value = 100;
            panel.querySelector('#min-age').value = 16;
            panel.querySelector('#max-age').value = 40;
            panel.querySelector('#league-filter').selectedIndex = -1;
            panel.querySelectorAll('input[type="checkbox"]').forEach(cb => cb.checked = false);
            
            // Reset transfer display
            document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card').forEach(card => {
                card.style.display = 'block';
                card.style.opacity = '1';
                card.style.transform = 'scale(1)';
            });
            
            // Hide results indicator
            const indicator = document.querySelector('.filter-results-indicator');
            if (indicator) indicator.style.display = 'none';
            
            // Clear saved preferences
            localStorage.removeItem('transferFilters');
        }

        // Data Persistence Functions
        function saveFilterPreferences(filters) {
            localStorage.setItem('transferFilters', JSON.stringify(filters));
        }

        function loadFilterPreferences() {
            const saved = localStorage.getItem('transferFilters');
            if (saved) {
                const filters = JSON.parse(saved);
                const panel = document.getElementById('advanced-filters-panel');
                
                if (panel) {
                    panel.querySelector('#min-value').value = filters.minValue || 0;
                    panel.querySelector('#max-value').value = filters.maxValue || 100;
                    panel.querySelector('#min-age').value = filters.minAge || 16;
                    panel.querySelector('#max-age').value = filters.maxAge || 40;
                    
                    if (filters.leagues) {
                        const leagueSelect = panel.querySelector('#league-filter');
                        Array.from(leagueSelect.options).forEach(option => {
                            option.selected = filters.leagues.includes(option.value);
                        });
                    }
                    
                    if (filters.contractStatus) {
                        panel.querySelectorAll('input[type="checkbox"]').forEach(cb => {
                            cb.checked = filters.contractStatus.includes(cb.value);
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        function saveWatchlistData() {
            const watchlistCards = document.querySelectorAll('.watchlist-card');
            const watchlistData = Array.from(watchlistCards).map(card => {
                const playerName = card.querySelector('h4').textContent;
                const probability = card.querySelector('.probability-value').textContent;
                return { playerName, probability, addedAt: Date.now() };
            });
            
            localStorage.setItem('transferWatchlist', JSON.stringify(watchlistData));
        }

        function loadWatchlistData() {
            const saved = localStorage.getItem('transferWatchlist');
            if (saved) {
                const watchlistData = JSON.parse(saved);
                const watchlistGrid = document.getElementById('watchlist-grid');
                const emptyState = watchlistGrid.querySelector('.empty-watchlist');
                
                if (emptyState && watchlistData.length > 0) {
                    emptyState.remove();
                }
                
                watchlistData.forEach(item => {
                    const watchlistCard = document.createElement('div');
                    watchlistCard.className = 'watchlist-card';
                    watchlistCard.innerHTML = `

                            <p>Transfer probability: <span class="probability-value">${item.probability}</span></p>
                            <small>Added ${getTimeAgo(item.addedAt)}</small>
                        </div>
                        <button class="remove-from-watchlist" onclick="removeFromWatchlist(this)">
                            <i class="fas fa-times"></i>
                        </button>
                    `;
                    
                    watchlistCard.style.cssText = `
                        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
                        border: 2px solid #e9ecef; border-radius: 15px; padding: 20px;
                        display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;
                        transition: all 0.3s ease; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);

        }

        function removeFromWatchlist(button) {
            button.parentElement.remove();
            saveWatchlistData();
            showNotification('Player removed from watchlist', 'info');
        }

        function getTimeAgo(timestamp) {
            const now = Date.now();
            const diff = now - timestamp;
            
            if (diff < 60 * 1000) return 'just now';
            if (diff < 60 * 60 * 1000) return `${Math.floor(diff / (60 * 1000))} min ago`;
            if (diff < 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000) return `${Math.floor(diff / (60 * 60 * 1000))} hr ago`;
            return `${Math.floor(diff / (24 * 60 * 60 * 1000))} days ago`;
        }

        // Enhanced initialization
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            setupAdvancedFilters();
            loadWatchlistData();
            
            // Auto-save watchlist when changes are made
            const watchlistGrid = document.getElementById('watchlist-grid');
            if (watchlistGrid) {
                const observer = new MutationObserver(() => saveWatchlistData());
                observer.observe(watchlistGrid, { childList: true });
            }
            

            // Enhanced Transfer Hub Functionality
            function initializeEnhancedFeatures() {
                // Enhanced Search with debouncing
                const searchInput = document.getElementById('transfer-search');
                let searchTimeout;
                
                if (searchInput) {
                    searchInput.addEventListener('input', function() {
                        clearTimeout(searchTimeout);
                        const searchTerm = this.value.toLowerCase().trim();
                        
                        searchTimeout = setTimeout(() => {
                            performEnhancedSearch(searchTerm);
                        }, 300);
                    });
                }

                // Real-time transfer data updates
                initializeRealTimeUpdates();
                
                // Enhanced filter combinations
                setupAdvancedFiltering();
                
                // Transfer value tracking
                initializeValueTracking();
                
                // Interactive transfer timeline
                setupInteractiveTimeline();
                
                // Live notifications system
                initializeLiveNotifications();
                
                console.log('Enhanced transfer hub features initialized');
            }

            function performEnhancedSearch(searchTerm) {
                const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                const rumorCards = document.querySelectorAll('.rumor-card');
                let visibleCount = 0;
                
                // Enhanced search algorithm
                const searchWords = searchTerm.split(' ').filter(word => word.length > 0);
                
                [...transferCards, ...rumorCards].forEach(card => {
                    if (!card) return;
                    
                    const cardData = extractCardData(card);
                    const relevanceScore = calculateRelevanceScore(cardData, searchWords);
                    
                    if (relevanceScore > 0) {
                        card.style.display = 'block';
                        card.style.order = Math.floor((1 - relevanceScore) * 1000);
                        visibleCount++;
                        highlightSearchTerms(card, searchWords);
                    } else {
                        card.style.display = 'none';
                    }
                });
                
                updateSearchResults(visibleCount, searchTerm);
            }

            function extractCardData(card) {
                const playerName = card.querySelector('.player-name')?.textContent || '';
                const clubs = card.querySelector('.transfer-clubs')?.textContent || '';
                const position = card.querySelector('.player-position')?.textContent || '';
                const fee = card.querySelector('.transfer-fee')?.textContent || '';
                const status = card.querySelector('.transfer-status')?.textContent || '';
                
                return {
                    playerName: playerName.toLowerCase(),
                    clubs: clubs.toLowerCase(),
                    position: position.toLowerCase(),
                    fee: fee.toLowerCase(),
                    status: status.toLowerCase(),
                    fullText: card.textContent.toLowerCase()
                };
            }

            function calculateRelevanceScore(cardData, searchWords) {
                let score = 0;
                
                searchWords.forEach(word => {
                    // Player name gets highest weight
                    if (cardData.playerName.includes(word)) score += 3;
                    // Club names get high weight
                    if (cardData.clubs.includes(word)) score += 2.5;
                    // Position gets medium weight
                    if (cardData.position.includes(word)) score += 1.5;
                    // Fee and status get lower weight
                    if (cardData.fee.includes(word)) score += 1;
                    if (cardData.status.includes(word)) score += 1;
                    // General text match gets minimal weight
                    if (cardData.fullText.includes(word)) score += 0.5;
                });
                
                return Math.min(score / searchWords.length, 1);
            }

            function highlightSearchTerms(card, searchWords) {
                // Remove existing highlights
                card.querySelectorAll('.search-highlight').forEach(highlight => {
                    const parent = highlight.parentNode;
                    parent.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(highlight.textContent), highlight);
                    parent.normalize();
                });
                
                // Add new highlights
                searchWords.forEach(word => {
                    const walker = document.createTreeWalker(
                        card,
                        NodeFilter.SHOW_TEXT,
                        null,
                        false
                    );
                    
                    const textNodes = [];
                    let node;
                    
                    while (node = walker.nextNode()) {
                        if (node.nodeValue.toLowerCase().includes(word)) {
                            textNodes.push(node);
                        }
                    }
                    
                    textNodes.forEach(textNode => {
                        const regex = new RegExp(`(${word})`, 'gi');
                        const content = textNode.nodeValue;
                        
                        if (regex.test(content)) {
                            const span = document.createElement('span');
                            span.innerHTML = content.replace(regex, '<span class="search-highlight">$1</span>');
                            textNode.parentNode.replaceChild(span, textNode);
                        }
                    });
                });
            }

            function initializeRealTimeUpdates() {
                const transferData = [
                    {
                        player: 'Martin Zubimendi',
                        from: 'Real Sociedad',
                        to: 'Liverpool',
                        fee: '€60M',
                        position: 'Defensive Midfielder',
                        status: 'In Progress',
                        probability: 85
                    },
                    {
                        player: 'João Palhinha',
                        from: 'Fulham',
                        to: 'Bayern Munich',
                        fee: '€50M',
                        position: 'Defensive Midfielder',
                        status: 'Medical Pending',
                        probability: 92
                    },
                    {
                        player: 'Jorrel Hato',
                        from: 'Ajax',
                        to: 'Chelsea',
                        fee: '€35M',
                        position: 'Centre-Back',
                        status: 'Negotiating',
                        probability: 68
                    }
                ];

                // Simulate real-time updates
                setInterval(() => {
                    const randomTransfer = transferData[Math.floor(Math.random() * transferData.length)];
                    const probabilityChange = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 10;
                    randomTransfer.probability = Math.max(0, Math.min(100, randomTransfer.probability + probabilityChange));
                    
                    updateTransferProbability(randomTransfer);
                    
                    if (Math.random() > 0.8) {
                        showLiveUpdate(randomTransfer);
                    }
                }, 15000);
            }

            function updateTransferProbability(transfer) {
                const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                cards.forEach(card => {
                    const playerName = card.querySelector('.player-name')?.textContent;
                    if (playerName && playerName.includes(transfer.player)) {
                        const probabilityElement = card.querySelector('.probability-bar');
                        if (probabilityElement) {
                            probabilityElement.style.width = `${transfer.probability}%`;
                            probabilityElement.style.transition = 'width 0.8s ease';
                        }
                    }
                });
            }

            function setupAdvancedFiltering() {
                const filters = {
                    club: document.getElementById('club-filter'),
                    position: document.getElementById('position-filter'),
                    feeRange: document.getElementById('fee-range')
                };

                // Enhanced fee range filtering
                if (filters.feeRange) {
                    filters.feeRange.addEventListener('change', function() {
                        const range = this.value;
                        filterByFeeRange(range);
                    });
                }

                // Enhanced position filtering
                if (filters.position) {
                    filters.position.addEventListener('change', function() {
                        const position = this.value;
                        filterByPosition(position);
                    });
                }
            }

            function filterByFeeRange(range) {
                const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                
                transferCards.forEach(card => {
                    const feeText = card.querySelector('.transfer-fee')?.textContent || '';
                    const feeValue = extractFeeValue(feeText);
                    
                    let show = true;
                    
                    switch(range) {
                        case '0-20':
                            show = feeValue >= 0 && feeValue <= 20;
                            break;
                        case '20-50':
                            show = feeValue > 20 && feeValue <= 50;
                            break;
                        case '50-100':
                            show = feeValue > 50 && feeValue <= 100;
                            break;
                        case '100+':
                            show = feeValue > 100;
                            break;
                        default:
                            show = true;
                    }
                    
                    if (feeText.toLowerCase().includes('loan') || feeText.toLowerCase().includes('free')) {
                        show = range === 'all' || range === '0-20';
                    }
                    
                    card.style.display = show ? 'block' : 'none';
                });
            }

            function extractFeeValue(feeText) {
                const match = feeText.match(/[£€]?(\d+(?:\.\d+)?)[mM]/);
                return match ? parseFloat(match[1]) : 0;
            }

            function filterByPosition(position) {
                const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                const positionMappings = {
                    'goalkeeper': ['goalkeeper', 'keeper', 'gk'],
                    'defender': ['defender', 'back', 'centre-back', 'full-back', 'wing-back'],
                    'midfielder': ['midfielder', 'midfield', 'central', 'attacking midfielder', 'defensive midfielder'],
                    'forward': ['forward', 'striker', 'winger', 'centre-forward', 'right winger', 'left winger']
                };
                
                transferCards.forEach(card => {
                    const positionText = card.querySelector('.player-position')?.textContent.toLowerCase() || '';
                    
                    let show = position === 'all';
                    
                    if (position !== 'all' && positionMappings[position]) {
                        show = positionMappings[position].some(pos => positionText.includes(pos));
                    }
                    
                    card.style.display = show ? 'block' : 'none';
                });
            }

            function initializeValueTracking() {
                // Add market value tracking for players
                const playerValues = {
                    'Viktor Gyokeres': { current: 55.3, change: +12.8, trend: 'up' },
                    'Bryan Mbeumo': { current: 71.0, change: +25.5, trend: 'up' },
                    'Benjamin Sesko': { current: 66.3, change: +8.2, trend: 'up' },
                    'Jack Grealish': { current: 45.0, change: -15.0, trend: 'down' },
                    'Milos Kerkez': { current: 40.0, change: +18.0, trend: 'up' }
                };

                // Update transfer cards with value information
                document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card').forEach(card => {
                    const playerName = card.querySelector('.player-name')?.textContent;
                    if (playerName && playerValues[playerName]) {
                        const value = playerValues[playerName];
                        addValueIndicator(card, value);
                    }
                });
            }

            function addValueIndicator(card, value) {
                const playerInfo = card.querySelector('.player-info');
                if (playerInfo && !playerInfo.querySelector('.value-indicator')) {
                    const indicator = document.createElement('div');
                    indicator.className = 'value-indicator';
                    indicator.innerHTML = `
                        <span class="market-value">Market Value: £${value.current}M</span>
                        <span class="value-change ${value.trend}">
                            ${value.change > 0 ? '+' : ''}${value.change}M
                            <i class="fas fa-arrow-${value.trend === 'up' ? 'up' : 'down'}"></i>
                        </span>
                    `;
                    playerInfo.appendChild(indicator);
                }
            }

            function setupInteractiveTimeline() {
                const timelineItems = document.querySelectorAll('.timeline-item');
                
                timelineItems.forEach(item => {
                    item.addEventListener('click', function() {
                        this.classList.toggle('expanded');
                        
                        // Add detailed information
                        if (this.classList.contains('expanded') && !this.querySelector('.timeline-details')) {
                            const details = document.createElement('div');
                            details.className = 'timeline-details';
                            details.innerHTML = `
                                <div class="detail-item">
                                    <i class="fas fa-calendar"></i>
                                    <span>Expected completion: Next 48 hours</span>
                                </div>
                                <div class="detail-item">
                                    <i class="fas fa-chart-line"></i>
                                    <span>Transfer probability: 85%</span>
                                </div>
                                <div class="detail-item">
                                    <i class="fas fa-newspaper"></i>
                                    <span>Last update: 2 hours ago</span>
                                </div>
                            `;
                            this.appendChild(details);
                        }
                    });
                });
            }

            function initializeLiveNotifications() {
                // Create notification container
                if (!document.querySelector('.notification-container')) {
                    const container = document.createElement('div');
                    container.className = 'notification-container';
                    document.body.appendChild(container);
                }
                
                // Show random live updates
                const liveUpdates = [
                    { type: 'transfer', message: '🚨 BREAKING: Medical scheduled for tomorrow', priority: 'high' },
                    { type: 'rumor', message: '📈 UPDATE: Transfer probability increased', priority: 'medium' },
                    { type: 'confirmed', message: '✅ CONFIRMED: Deal announcement imminent', priority: 'high' },
                    { type: 'bid', message: '💰 NEW BID: Club increases offer by £5M', priority: 'medium' }
                ];
                
                setInterval(() => {
                    if (Math.random() > 0.85) {
                        const update = liveUpdates[Math.floor(Math.random() * liveUpdates.length)];
                        showLiveNotification(update);
                    }
                }, 25000);
            }

            function showLiveNotification(update) {
                const container = document.querySelector('.notification-container');
                if (!container) return;
                
                const notification = document.createElement('div');
                notification.className = `live-notification ${update.priority}`;
                notification.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="notification-content">
                        <span class="notification-message">${update.message}</span>
                        <button class="notification-close">×</button>
                    </div>
                `;
                
                container.appendChild(notification);
                
                // Auto remove after 5 seconds
                setTimeout(() => {
                    notification.classList.add('fade-out');
                    setTimeout(() => notification.remove(), 300);
                }, 5000);
                
                // Manual close
                notification.querySelector('.notification-close').addEventListener('click', () => {
                    notification.classList.add('fade-out');
                    setTimeout(() => notification.remove(), 300);
                });
            }

            function showLiveUpdate(transfer) {
                const message = `📊 ${transfer.player}: Transfer probability updated to ${Math.round(transfer.probability)}%`;
                showLiveNotification({ type: 'update', message, priority: 'low' });
            }

            function updateSearchResults(visibleCount, searchTerm) {
                const container = document.querySelector('.transfers-grid')?.parentElement;
                if (!container) return;
                
                let resultsIndicator = container.querySelector('.search-results-indicator');
                
                if (searchTerm.length > 0) {
                    if (!resultsIndicator) {
                        resultsIndicator = document.createElement('div');
                        resultsIndicator.className = 'search-results-indicator';
                        container.insertBefore(resultsIndicator, container.querySelector('.transfers-grid'));
                    }
                    
                    resultsIndicator.innerHTML = `
                        <div class="results-info">
                            <i class="fas fa-search"></i>
                            <span>${visibleCount} result${visibleCount !== 1 ? 's' : ''} for "${searchTerm}"</span>
                            ${visibleCount === 0 ? '<button class="clear-search" onclick="clearSearch()">Clear search</button>' : ''}
                        </div>
                    `;
                } else if (resultsIndicator) {
                    resultsIndicator.remove();
                }
            }

            function clearSearch() {
                const searchInput = document.getElementById('transfer-search');
                if (searchInput) {
                    searchInput.value = '';
                    searchInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'));
                }
            }

            // Initialize enhanced features
            setTimeout(initializeEnhancedFeatures, 1000);

        });

    </script>
</body>
</html>
