            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 20px;
            border-bottom: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a, #6b4c9a);
            color: white;
        }

        .filters-header h3 {
            margin: 0;
            font-size: 1.3em;
        }

        .close-filters {
            background: none;
            border: none;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1.5em;
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 5px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            transition: background 0.3s ease;
        }

        .close-filters:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
        }

        .filters-grid {
            padding: 20px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 25px;
        }

        .filter-group label {
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #4a2c7a;
        }

        .range-slider {
            position: relative;
            margin: 15px 0;
        }

        .range-slider input[type="range"] {
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 5px;
            background: none;
            pointer-events: none;
            -webkit-appearance: none;
        }

        .range-slider input[type="range"]::-webkit-slider-thumb {
            height: 20px;
            width: 20px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: #ffd700;
            cursor: pointer;
            border: 3px solid white;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            pointer-events: auto;
            -webkit-appearance: none;
        }

        .range-values {
            text-align: center;
            margin-top: 20px;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .age-range {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .age-range input {
            padding: 8px 12px;
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 10px;
            width: 80px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .checkbox-group {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .checkbox-group label {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            font-weight: normal;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .filters-actions {
            padding: 20px;
            border-top: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            display: flex;
            gap: 15px;
        }

        .apply-filters-btn,
        .reset-filters-btn {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 12px;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 25px;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .apply-filters-btn {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
        }

        .reset-filters-btn {
            background: #6c757d;
            color: white;
        }

        .apply-filters-btn:hover,
        .reset-filters-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }

        /* Transfer Insights */
        .transfer-insights-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .insights-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .insights-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
        }

        .toggle-advanced-filters {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a, #6b4c9a);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .toggle-advanced-filters:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(74, 44, 122, 0.3);
        }

        .insights-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }

        .insight-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 20px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }

        .insight-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
        }

        .insight-icon {
            font-size: 2.5em;
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-radius: 50%;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .insight-content h4 {
            margin: 0 0 8px 0;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-size: 1.1em;
        }

        .insight-content p {
            margin: 0 0 8px 0;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }

        .insight-trend {
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 0.9em;
        }

        .insight-trend.positive {
            color: #28a745;
        }

        .insight-detail {
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 4px 10px;
            border-radius: 12px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            font-weight: 600;
            display: inline-block;
        }

        /* Watchlist Section */
        .watchlist-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .watchlist-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .watchlist-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
        }

        .watchlist-controls {
            display: flex;
            gap: 15px;
            align-items: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .add-to-watchlist-btn {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #28a745, #34ce57);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .add-to-watchlist-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(40, 167, 69, 0.3);
        }

        .watchlist-sort select {
            padding: 10px 15px;
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 20px;
            background: white;
            color: #333;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .watchlist-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }

        .empty-watchlist {
            grid-column: 1 / -1;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 60px 20px;
            color: #6c757d;
        }

        .empty-watchlist i {
            font-size: 4em;
            color: #8e6bb3;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        /* Alerts Section */
        .alerts-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .alerts-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .alerts-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
        }

        .setup-alerts-btn {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b, #ff8787);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .setup-alerts-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.3);
        }

        .alerts-preview {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }

        .alert-example {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 15px;
            padding: 20px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }

        .alert-example:hover {
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
        }

        .alert-type {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .alert-content {
            color: #6c757d;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }

        /* Mobile Optimizations */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .advanced-filters-panel {
                width: 100%;
                right: -100%;
            }

            .comparison-selects {
                flex-direction: column;
                width: 100%;
            }

            .comparison-select {
                width: 100%;
                min-width: auto;
            }

            .vs-indicator {
                order: -1;
            }

            .timeline-line {
                left: 20px;
            }

            .timeline-event-content {
                width: calc(100% - 60px);
                margin-left: 60px;
            }

            .timeline-event:nth-child(even) .timeline-event-content {
                margin-left: 60px;
            }

            .timeline-event-dot {
                left: 20px;
            }

            .insights-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }

            .insight-card {
                flex-direction: column;
                text-align: center;
            }
        }
        
        .transfers-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(350px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
            margin-bottom: 40px;
        }
        
        .transfer-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff 0%, #f8f9fa 100%);
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            transition: all 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }
        
        .transfer-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -2px;
            left: -2px;
            right: -2px;
            bottom: -2px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-radius: 20px;
            opacity: 0;
            z-index: -1;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
            background-size: 400% 400%;
            animation: gradientShift 3s ease infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes gradientShift {
            0% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
            50% { background-position: 100% 50%; }
            100% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
        }
        
        .transfer-card:hover::before {
            opacity: 1;
        }
        
        .transfer-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.25);
        }
        
        .transfer-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: start;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        .transfer-clubs {
            flex: 1;
            color: #333333;
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        
        .club-badge {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-right: 10px;
        }
        
        .transfer-arrow {
            color: #ffd700;
            margin: 0 15px;
            font-size: 1.2em;
        }
        
        .transfer-fee {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 5px 15px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 0.9em;
        }
        
        .player-info {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }
        
        .player-name {
            font-size: 1.3em;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }
        
        .player-position {
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
        }
        
        .transfer-details {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding-top: 15px;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }
        
        .transfer-date {
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
        }
        
        .transfer-status {
            padding: 5px 12px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            font-size: 0.85em;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-transform: uppercase;
        }
        
        .status-confirmed {
            background: rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.2);
            color: #4caf50;
            border: 1px solid #4caf50;
        }
        
        .status-rumor {
            background: rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.2);
            color: #ff9800;
            border: 1px solid #ff9800;
        }
        
        .status-medical {
            background: rgba(33, 150, 243, 0.2);
            color: #2196f3;
            border: 1px solid #2196f3;
        }
        
        
        .no-results {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 60px 20px;
            color: #6c757d;
        }
        
        .no-results i {
            font-size: 4em;
            color: #8e6bb3;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        /* Transfer Countdown Timer */
        .transfer-countdown-section {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b, #ff8787);
            padding: 30px 20px;
            margin: 30px 0;
        }
        
        .countdown-container {
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .countdown-title {
            color: white;
            font-size: 1.5em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 2px;
        }
        
        .countdown-timer {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .time-unit {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            min-width: 100px;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .time-unit:hover {
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        
        .time-value {
            display: block;
            font-size: 3em;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #ff6b6b;
            line-height: 1;
        }
        
        .time-label {
            display: block;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            color: #666;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            margin-top: 10px;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
        }
        
        /* Live Transfer Ticker */
        .transfer-ticker-section {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a, #6b4c9a);
            padding: 15px 0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        
        .ticker-header {
            position: absolute;
            left: 20px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            z-index: 10;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            background: transparent;
            padding-right: 20px;
        }
        
        .ticker-badge {
            background: #ff0000;
            color: white;
            padding: 5px 10px;
            border-radius: 5px;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            animation: pulse 1.5s infinite;
        }
        
        .ticker-title {
            color: white;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.9em;
        }
        
        .ticker-wrapper {
            overflow: hidden;
            padding-left: 250px;
        }
        
        .ticker-content {
            display: flex;
            animation: scroll 30s linear infinite;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }
        
        .ticker-item {
            color: #ffd700;
            padding: 0 50px;
            font-size: 1em;
            font-weight: 500;
        }
        
        @keyframes scroll {
            0% { transform: translateX(0); }
            100% { transform: translateX(-50%); }
        }
        
        /* Advanced Filters */
        .advanced-filters {
            display: flex;
            gap: 15px;
            margin-top: 20px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            align-items: center;
        }
        
        .filter-select {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            border: 2px solid #8e6bb3;
            background: #ffffff;
            color: #333333;
            border-radius: 50px;
            font-size: 1em;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            min-width: 150px;
        }
        
        .filter-select:hover {
            background: #8e6bb3;
            color: white;
            border-color: #ffd700;
        }
        
        .filter-select:focus {
            outline: none;
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .reset-filters-btn {
            padding: 12px 25px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b, #ff8787);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 50px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }
        
        .reset-filters-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.4);
        }
        
        /* Club View Toggle */
        .view-toggle {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 10px;
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        
        .view-btn {
            padding: 10px 20px;
            background: #6b4c9a;
            color: white;
            border: 2px solid #ffd700;
            border-radius: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .view-btn.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
        }
        
        /* Transfer Analytics Section */
        .transfer-analytics {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .analytics-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        
        .analytics-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        
        .analytics-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }
        
        .analytics-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6b4c9a, #8e6bb3);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            border: 2px solid rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        
        .analytics-card h4 {
            color: #ffd700;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            font-size: 1.2em;
        }
        
        .club-spending-list {
            list-style: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        
        .club-spending-item {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: 10px 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .spending-bar {
            height: 8px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-radius: 4px;
            margin-top: 5px;
            transition: width 1s ease;
        }
        
        /* Transfer Probability Tracker */
        .transfer-probability-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .probability-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        
        .probability-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
        }
        
        .probability-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(350px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }
        
        .probability-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
            transition: all 0.4s ease;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .probability-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            height: 4px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #4caf50, #8bc34a, #ffc107, #ff9800, #f44336);
            background-size: 200% 100%;
            animation: probabilityGradient 3s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes probabilityGradient {
            0% { background-position: 200% 0; }
            100% { background-position: -200% 0; }
        }
        
        .probability-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
        }
        
        .probability-header-info {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        .probability-clubs {
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        
        .probability-percentage {
            font-size: 1.8em;
            font-weight: 900;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4caf50, #66bb6a);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
        }
        
        .probability-bar-container {
            background: #e9ecef;
            height: 12px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            overflow: hidden;
            margin: 15px 0;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .probability-bar {
            height: 100%;
            border-radius: 6px;
            transition: width 1.5s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .probability-bar::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
            animation: shimmer 2s infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes shimmer {
            0% { transform: translateX(-100%); }
            100% { transform: translateX(100%); }
        }
        
        .probability-high { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #4caf50, #66bb6a); }
        .probability-medium { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffc107, #ffeb3b); }
        .probability-low { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff9800, #ffb74d); }
        .probability-unlikely { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #f44336, #ef5350); }
        
        .probability-factors {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 8px;
            margin-top: 15px;
        }
        
        .factor-tag {
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 4px 10px;
            border-radius: 12px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            font-weight: 500;
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        /* Social Sharing Section */
        .social-sharing {
            position: fixed;
            right: 20px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            z-index: 1000;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 15px;
        }
        
        .share-btn {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: white;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .share-btn::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), transparent);
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .share-btn:hover::before {
            opacity: 1;
            animation: shine 0.6s ease;
        }
        
        @keyframes shine {
            0% { transform: translateX(-100%) rotate(45deg); }
            100% { transform: translateX(100%) rotate(45deg); }
        }
        
        .share-twitter { background: #1da1f2; }
        .share-facebook { background: #4267b2; }
        .share-linkedin { background: #0077b5; }
        .share-whatsapp { background: #25d366; }
        .share-copy { background: #6c757d; }
        
        .share-btn:hover {
            transform: scale(1.1);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
        }
        
        /* Enhanced Transfer Cards with Interactive Elements */
        .transfer-card-enhanced {
            position: relative;
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        
        .transfer-card-enhanced .quick-actions {
            position: absolute;
            top: 15px;
            right: 15px;
            display: flex;
            gap: 8px;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .transfer-card-enhanced:hover .quick-actions {
            opacity: 1;
        }
        
        .quick-action-btn {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            border: none;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            color: #4a2c7a;
        }
        
        .quick-action-btn:hover {
            background: #ffd700;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        
        /* Transfer News Feed */
        .transfer-news-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .news-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 25px;
        }
        
        .news-title {
            font-size: 1.8em;
            color: #ffd700;
            font-weight: bold;
        }
        
        /* Live Updates Badge */
        .live-updates-badge {
            position: fixed;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b, #ff8787);
            color: white;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            border-radius: 25px;
            font-weight: 600;
            z-index: 1001;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.3);
            animation: pulse 2s infinite;
        }
        
        .live-updates-badge::before {
            content: '🔴';
            margin-right: 8px;
        }
        
        /* Interactive Filter Chips */
        .filter-chips {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .filter-chip {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            border: 2px solid #8e6bb3;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 8px 16px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            font-weight: 500;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .filter-chip::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: -100%;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3), transparent);
            transition: left 0.5s ease;
        }
        
        .filter-chip:hover::before {
            left: 100%;
        }
        
        .filter-chip.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-color: #ffd700;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .filter-chip .chip-count {
            background: rgba(74, 44, 122, 0.1);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 2px 8px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            margin-left: 8px;
        }
        
        /* Enhanced Analytics with Charts */
        .analytics-chart-container {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6b4c9a, #8e6bb3);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .analytics-chart-container::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            left: -50%;
            width: 200%;
            height: 200%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,255,255,0.03) 1px, transparent 1px);
            background-size: 20px 20px;
            animation: movePattern 15s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes movePattern {
            0% { transform: translate(0, 0) rotate(0deg); }
            100% { transform: translate(20px, 20px) rotate(360deg); }
        }
        
        .chart-placeholder {
            height: 200px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 10px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: #ffd700;
            font-size: 1.2em;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        
        /* Notification System */
        .notification-container {
            position: fixed;
            top: 20px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            z-index: 1002;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        
        .notification {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4caf50, #66bb6a);
            color: white;
            padding: 15px 25px;
            border-radius: 25px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.3);
            animation: slideInDown 0.5s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-50px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        
        /* Advanced Mobile Enhancements */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .social-sharing {
                position: static;
                transform: none;
                flex-direction: row;
                justify-content: center;
                margin: 20px 0;
            }
            
            .probability-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .filter-chips {
                justify-content: center;
            }
            
            .live-updates-badge {
                top: auto;
                bottom: 20px;
                left: 50%;
                transform: translateX(-50%);
                right: auto;
            }
        }
        
        .news-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(350px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }
        
        .news-card {
            background: #ffffff;
            border-radius: 15px;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }
        
        .news-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
        }
        
        .news-image {
            width: 100%;
            height: 200px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #8e6bb3, #b19cd9);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 3em;
        }
        
        .news-content {
            padding: 20px;
        }
        
        .news-category {
            background: #ffd700;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 5px 10px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            font-weight: 600;
            display: inline-block;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        
        .news-headline {
            color: #333333;
            font-size: 1.1em;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }
        
        .news-meta {
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .hero-title {
                font-size: 2.5em;
            }
            
            .transfers-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .transfer-stats {
                gap: 20px;
            }
            
            .stat-card {
                padding: 15px 20px;
            }
            
            .category-tab {
                padding: 10px 20px;
                font-size: 0.9em;
            }
            
            .ticker-header {
                position: relative;
                left: 0;
                transform: none;
                padding: 10px 20px;
                justify-content: center;
            }
            
            .ticker-wrapper {
                padding-left: 20px;
            }
            
            .time-unit {
                min-width: 70px;
                padding: 15px 10px;
            }
            
            .time-value {
                font-size: 2em;
            }
            
            .advanced-filters {
                flex-direction: column;
                width: 100%;
            }
            
            .filter-select {
                width: 100%;
            }
        }

        /* Enhanced Transfer Hub Styles */
        .search-highlight {
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #333;
            padding: 2px 4px;
            border-radius: 3px;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .value-indicator {
            margin-top: 8px;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9fa, #e9ecef);
            border-radius: 6px;
            border-left: 3px solid #38003c;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
        }

        .market-value {
            display: block;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #333;
            margin-bottom: 4px;
        }

        .value-change {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 4px;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .value-change.up {
            color: #28a745;
        }

        .value-change.down {
            color: #dc3545;
        }

        .timeline-item {
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .timeline-item:hover {
            background: rgba(56, 0, 60, 0.05);
            border-radius: 8px;
        }

        .timeline-item.expanded {
            background: rgba(56, 0, 60, 0.08);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 16px;
        }

        .timeline-details {
            margin-top: 12px;
            padding: 12px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
            border-radius: 6px;
            border-left: 3px solid #38003c;
        }

        .detail-item {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            color: #555;
        }

        .detail-item:last-child {
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }

        .detail-item i {
            color: #38003c;
            width: 16px;
        }

        .notification-container {
            position: fixed;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            z-index: 10000;
            max-width: 350px;
        }

        .live-notification {
            background: white;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transform: translateX(100%);
            animation: slideIn 0.3s ease forwards;
            border-left: 4px solid #38003c;
        }

        .live-notification.high {
            border-left-color: #dc3545;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fff5f5, #ffffff);
        }

        .live-notification.medium {
            border-left-color: #ffc107;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fffbf0, #ffffff);
        }

        .live-notification.low {
            border-left-color: #17a2b8;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f0f9ff, #ffffff);
        }

        .notification-content {
            padding: 12px 16px;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .notification-message {
            flex: 1;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            color: #333;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .notification-close {
            background: none;
            border: none;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            color: #999;
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 0;
            margin-left: 12px;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .notification-close:hover {
            color: #333;
        }

        .live-notification.fade-out {
            animation: slideOut 0.3s ease forwards;
        }

        @keyframes slideIn {
            from { transform: translateX(100%); opacity: 0; }
            to { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; }
        }

        @keyframes slideOut {
            from { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; }
            to { transform: translateX(100%); opacity: 0; }
        }

        .search-results-indicator {
            margin: 20px 0;
            padding: 15px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9fa, #e9ecef);
            border-radius: 8px;
            border-left: 4px solid #38003c;
        }

        .results-info {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            color: #555;
        }

        .results-info i {
            color: #38003c;
        }

        .clear-search {
            background: #38003c;
            color: white;
            border: none;
            padding: 6px 12px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            margin-left: auto;
        }

        .clear-search:hover {
            background: #4a1a4e;
        }

        .transfer-card {
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .transfer-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(56, 0, 60, 0.15);
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .notification-container {
                top: 10px;
                right: 10px;
                left: 10px;
                max-width: none;
            }

            .live-notification {
                transform: translateY(-100%);
                animation: slideInMobile 0.3s ease forwards;
            }

            .live-notification.fade-out {
                animation: slideOutMobile 0.3s ease forwards;
            }

            @keyframes slideInMobile {
                from { transform: translateY(-100%); opacity: 0; }
                to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
            }

            @keyframes slideOutMobile {
                from { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
                to { transform: translateY(-100%); opacity: 0; }
            }

            .value-indicator {
                font-size: 0.8rem;
                padding: 6px 10px;
            }

            .timeline-details {
                padding: 10px;
            }

            .detail-item {
                font-size: 0.85rem;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Include Header -->
    <div include="./header.html"></div>

    <!-- Live Updates Badge -->
    <div class="live-updates-badge">
        Live Updates
    </div>

    <!-- Social Sharing -->
    <div class="social-sharing">
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-twitter" onclick="shareOnTwitter()" title="Share on Twitter">
            <i class="fab fa-twitter"></i>
        </a>
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-facebook" onclick="shareOnFacebook()" title="Share on Facebook">
            <i class="fab fa-facebook-f"></i>
        </a>
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-linkedin" onclick="shareOnLinkedIn()" title="Share on LinkedIn">
            <i class="fab fa-linkedin-in"></i>
        </a>
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-whatsapp" onclick="shareOnWhatsApp()" title="Share on WhatsApp">
            <i class="fab fa-whatsapp"></i>
        </a>
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-copy" onclick="copyToClipboard()" title="Copy Link">
            <i class="fas fa-link"></i>
        </a>
    </div>

    <!-- Notification Container -->
    <div class="notification-container" id="notification-container"></div>

    <div class="transfer-hub-hero">
        <div class="hero-content">
            <h1 class="hero-title">EPL Transfer Hub</h1>
            <p class="hero-subtitle">Track every move in the Premier League transfer market</p>
            <div class="transfer-stats">
                <div class="stat-card">
                    <span class="stat-number">53</span>
                    <span class="stat-label">Total Transfers</span>
                </div>
                <div class="stat-card">
                    <span class="stat-number">£2.1B</span>
                    <span class="stat-label">Total Spent</span>
                </div>
                <div class="stat-card">
                    <span class="stat-number">20</span>
                    <span class="stat-label">Confirmed Deals</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Transfer Window Countdown Timer -->
    <div class="transfer-countdown-section">
        <div class="countdown-container">
            <h3 class="countdown-title">⏰ Transfer Window Closes In:</h3>
            <div class="countdown-timer" id="countdown-timer">
                <div class="time-unit">
                    <span class="time-value" id="days">00</span>
                    <span class="time-label">Days</span>
                </div>
                <div class="time-unit">
                    <span class="time-value" id="hours">00</span>
                    <span class="time-label">Hours</span>
                </div>
                <div class="time-unit">
                    <span class="time-value" id="minutes">00</span>
                    <span class="time-label">Minutes</span>
                </div>
                <div class="time-unit">
                    <span class="time-value" id="seconds">00</span>
                    <span class="time-label">Seconds</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
    // Inline countdown script - runs immediately after HTML elements are created
    (function() {
        console.log('Inline countdown script starting...');
        
        function updateCountdownNow() {
            // September 1, 2025 at 7:00 PM
            const deadline = new Date('2025-09-01T19:00:00').getTime();
            const now = Date.now();
            const timeLeft = deadline - now;
            
            if (timeLeft <= 0) {
                document.getElementById('days').innerHTML = '00';
                document.getElementById('hours').innerHTML = '00';
                document.getElementById('minutes').innerHTML = '00';
                document.getElementById('seconds').innerHTML = '00';
                console.log('Transfer window closed');
                return;
            }
            
            const days = Math.floor(timeLeft / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
            const hours = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60));
            const minutes = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
            const seconds = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);
            
            // Force update using innerHTML
            const daysEl = document.getElementById('days');
            const hoursEl = document.getElementById('hours');
            const minutesEl = document.getElementById('minutes');
            const secondsEl = document.getElementById('seconds');
            
            if (daysEl) daysEl.innerHTML = String(days).padStart(2, '0');
            if (hoursEl) hoursEl.innerHTML = String(hours).padStart(2, '0');
            if (minutesEl) minutesEl.innerHTML = String(minutes).padStart(2, '0');
            if (secondsEl) secondsEl.innerHTML = String(seconds).padStart(2, '0');
            
            console.log(`Inline countdown: ${days}d ${hours}h ${minutes}m ${seconds}s`);
        }
        
        // Start immediately
        updateCountdownNow();
        
        // Update every second
        setInterval(updateCountdownNow, 1000);
        
        console.log('Inline countdown started successfully');
    })();
    </script>

    <!-- Live Transfer Ticker -->
    <div class="transfer-ticker-section">
        <div class="ticker-header">
            <span class="ticker-badge">🔴 LIVE</span>
            <span class="ticker-title">Latest Transfer Updates</span>
        </div>
        <div class="ticker-wrapper">
            <div class="ticker-content" id="ticker-content">
                <span class="ticker-item">⚡ BREAKING: Arsenal close to signing Martin Zubimendi for £56M</span>
                <span class="ticker-item">📝 DONE DEAL: Jack Grealish joins Everton on season-long loan</span>
                <span class="ticker-item">🔥 HOT: Man United complete £71M Bryan Mbeumo signing</span>
                <span class="ticker-item">💰 RECORD: Illia Zabarnyi to PSG for £53.5M - Bournemouth's biggest sale</span>
                <span class="ticker-item">✅ CONFIRMED: Viktor Gyokeres signs for Arsenal from Sporting CP</span>
                <span class="ticker-item">🚨 EXCLUSIVE: Son Heung-min in advanced talks with Los Angeles FC</span>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="transfer-controls">
        <div class="search-filter-container">
            <div class="search-box">
                <input type="text" id="transfer-search" placeholder="Search players, clubs, or agents...">
                <i class="fas fa-search"></i>
            </div>
            <div class="filter-buttons">
                <button class="filter-btn active" data-filter="all">All Clubs</button>
                <button class="filter-btn" data-filter="top6">Top 6</button>
                <button class="filter-btn" data-filter="incoming">Incoming</button>
                <button class="filter-btn" data-filter="outgoing">Outgoing</button>
                <button class="filter-btn" data-filter="loans">Loans</button>
                <button class="filter-btn" data-filter="free">Free Transfers</button>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="advanced-filters">
            <select id="club-filter" class="filter-select">
                <option value="all">All Clubs</option>
                <option value="arsenal">Arsenal</option>
                <option value="chelsea">Chelsea</option>
                <option value="liverpool">Liverpool</option>
                <option value="man-city">Manchester City</option>
                <option value="man-united">Manchester United</option>
                <option value="tottenham">Tottenham</option>
            </select>
            <select id="position-filter" class="filter-select">
                <option value="all">All Positions</option>
                <option value="goalkeeper">Goalkeeper</option>
                <option value="defender">Defender</option>
                <option value="midfielder">Midfielder</option>
                <option value="forward">Forward</option>
            </select>
            <select id="fee-range" class="filter-select">
                <option value="all">All Fees</option>
                <option value="0-20">£0 - £20M</option>
                <option value="20-50">£20M - £50M</option>
                <option value="50-100">£50M - £100M</option>
                <option value="100+">£100M+</option>
            </select>
            <button class="reset-filters-btn" onclick="resetFilters()">
                <i class="fas fa-undo"></i> Reset
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>

        // Initialize all transfers to be loaded
        function loadAllTransfersForCategory(category) {
            const transfersGrid = document.querySelector(`#${category} .transfers-grid`);
            if (!transfersGrid) return;
            
            // Clear existing transfers first
            transfersGrid.innerHTML = '';
            
            // Map category IDs to database keys
            const categoryMap = {
                'confirmed': 'confirmed',
                'rumors': 'rumors',
                'done-deals': 'doneDeals',
                'medical': 'medical'
            };
            
            const dbCategory = categoryMap[category];
            const transfers = transferDatabase[dbCategory];
            
            if (!transfers) return;
            
            // Create all transfer cards
            transfers.forEach((transfer, index) => {
                const cardHTML = createTransferCard(transfer);
                const tempDiv = document.createElement('div');
                tempDiv.innerHTML = cardHTML;
                const newCard = tempDiv.firstElementChild;
                
                // Remove the opacity and transform styles for immediate display
                newCard.style.opacity = '1';
                newCard.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                
                transfersGrid.appendChild(newCard);
                
                // Add enhanced features to new cards
                addEnhancedFeaturesToCard(newCard);
            });
        }
        
        function addEnhancedFeaturesToCard(card) {
            card.classList.add('transfer-card-enhanced');
            const quickActions = document.createElement('div');
            quickActions.className = 'quick-actions';
            quickActions.innerHTML = `
                <button class="quick-action-btn" onclick="toggleFavorite(this)" title="Add to Favorites">
                    <i class="far fa-heart"></i>
                </button>
                <button class="quick-action-btn" onclick="shareTransfer(this)" title="Share Transfer">
                    <i class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
                </button>
                <button class="quick-action-btn" onclick="setReminder(this)" title="Set Reminder">
                    <i class="far fa-bell"></i>
                </button>
            `;
            card.appendChild(quickActions);
        }

        function createTransferCard(transfer) {
            return `
                <div class="transfer-card transfer-card-new" style="opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px);">
                    <div class="transfer-header">
                        <div class="transfer-clubs">
                            <span class="club-badge">${transfer.fromBadge}</span>
                            <span>${transfer.fromClub}</span>
                            <span class="transfer-arrow">→</span>
                            <span class="club-badge">${transfer.toBadge}</span>
                            <span>${transfer.toClub}</span>
                        </div>
                        <span class="transfer-fee">${transfer.fee}</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="player-info">
                        <div class="player-name">${transfer.player}</div>
                        <div class="player-position">${transfer.position}</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="transfer-details">
                        <span class="transfer-date">${transfer.date}</span>
                        <span class="transfer-status ${transfer.statusClass}">${transfer.status}</span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `;
        }

        // Update transfer stats dynamically
        function updateTransferStats() {
            try {
                // Count transfers from database
                const confirmedCount = transferDatabase.confirmed ? transferDatabase.confirmed.length : 20;
                const rumorsCount = transferDatabase.rumors ? transferDatabase.rumors.length : 13;
                const doneDealsCount = transferDatabase.doneDeals ? transferDatabase.doneDeals.length : 12;
                const medicalCount = transferDatabase.medical ? transferDatabase.medical.length : 8;
                
                const totalTransfers = confirmedCount + rumorsCount + doneDealsCount + medicalCount;
                
                // Calculate total spent (estimate £40M average per transfer)
                const totalSpentBillions = Math.round((totalTransfers * 40) / 1000 * 10) / 10;
                
                // Update stat displays
                const statNumbers = document.querySelectorAll('.stat-number');
                if (statNumbers.length >= 3) {
                    statNumbers[0].textContent = totalTransfers;
                    statNumbers[1].textContent = `£${totalSpentBillions}B`;
                    statNumbers[2].textContent = confirmedCount;
                }
                
                console.log(`Stats updated: ${totalTransfers} total, £${totalSpentBillions}B spent, ${confirmedCount} confirmed`);
            } catch (error) {
                console.log('Stats update failed, using default values');
            }
        }

        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            // Update stats when page loads
            updateTransferStats();
            
            // Duplicate ticker content for seamless scrolling
            const tickerContent = document.getElementById('ticker-content');
            if (tickerContent) {
                tickerContent.innerHTML += tickerContent.innerHTML;
            }
            
            // Category tabs
            const categoryTabs = document.querySelectorAll('.category-tab');
            const transferSections = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-section');
            
            categoryTabs.forEach(tab => {
                tab.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const category = this.dataset.category;
                    
                    // Update active tab
                    categoryTabs.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
                    this.classList.add('active');
                    
                    // Show corresponding section
                    transferSections.forEach(section => {
                        section.classList.remove('active');
                        if (section.id === category) {
                            section.classList.add('active');
                        }
                    });
                });
            });
            
            // Enhanced Filter System
            const filterButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn');
            const clubFilter = document.getElementById('club-filter');
            const positionFilter = document.getElementById('position-filter');
            const feeRange = document.getElementById('fee-range');
            
            function applyFilters() {
                const activeFilter = document.querySelector('.filter-btn.active').dataset.filter;
                const selectedClub = clubFilter ? clubFilter.value : 'all';
                const selectedPosition = positionFilter ? positionFilter.value : 'all';
                const selectedFeeRange = feeRange ? feeRange.value : 'all';
                
                const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                
                transferCards.forEach(card => {
                    let show = true;
                    const cardText = card.textContent.toLowerCase();
                    
                    // Apply quick filters
                    if (activeFilter === 'top6') {
                        const top6 = ['arsenal', 'chelsea', 'liverpool', 'man city', 'man united', 'tottenham'];
                        show = top6.some(club => cardText.includes(club));
                    } else if (activeFilter === 'loans') {
                        show = cardText.includes('loan');
                    } else if (activeFilter === 'free') {
                        show = cardText.includes('free');
                    }
                    
                    // Apply advanced filters
                    if (selectedClub !== 'all' && !cardText.includes(selectedClub.replace('-', ' '))) {
                        show = false;
                    }
                    
                    if (selectedPosition !== 'all') {
                        const positions = {
                            'goalkeeper': ['goalkeeper', 'keeper'],
                            'defender': ['defender', 'back', 'centre-back'],
                            'midfielder': ['midfielder', 'midfield'],
                            'forward': ['forward', 'striker', 'winger']
                        };
                        show = show && positions[selectedPosition].some(pos => cardText.includes(pos));
                    }
                    
                    card.style.display = show ? 'block' : 'none';
                });
            }
            
            filterButtons.forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    filterButtons.forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active'));
                    this.classList.add('active');
                    applyFilters();
                });
            });
            
            if (clubFilter) clubFilter.addEventListener('change', applyFilters);
            if (positionFilter) positionFilter.addEventListener('change', applyFilters);
            if (feeRange) feeRange.addEventListener('change', applyFilters);
            
            // Reset Filters
            window.resetFilters = function() {
                document.querySelector('.filter-btn[data-filter="all"]').click();
                if (clubFilter) clubFilter.value = 'all';
                if (positionFilter) positionFilter.value = 'all';
                if (feeRange) feeRange.value = 'all';
                applyFilters();
            };
            
            // Enhanced Search functionality
            const searchInput = document.getElementById('transfer-search');
            
            searchInput.addEventListener('input', function() {
                const searchTerm = this.value.toLowerCase();
                const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                let visibleCount = 0;
                
                transferCards.forEach(card => {
                    const text = card.textContent.toLowerCase();
                    if (text.includes(searchTerm)) {
                        card.style.display = 'block';
                        visibleCount++;
                    } else {
                        card.style.display = 'none';
                    }
                });
                
                // Show/hide no results message
                const activeSection = document.querySelector('.transfer-section.active');
                let noResultsMsg = activeSection.querySelector('.no-results-message');
                
                if (visibleCount === 0 && searchTerm.length > 0) {
                    if (!noResultsMsg) {
                        noResultsMsg = document.createElement('div');
                        noResultsMsg.className = 'no-results-message';
                        noResultsMsg.innerHTML = `
                            <div class="no-results">
                                <i class="fas fa-search"></i>
                                <p>No transfers found for "${searchTerm}"</p>
                            </div>
                        `;
                        activeSection.appendChild(noResultsMsg);
                    }
                } else if (noResultsMsg) {
                    noResultsMsg.remove();
                }
            });
            
            // Animate spending bars on scroll
            const observerOptions = {
                threshold: 0.5
            };
            
            const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        const bars = entry.target.querySelectorAll('.spending-bar');
                        bars.forEach((bar, index) => {
                            setTimeout(() => {
                                bar.style.width = bar.getAttribute('style').match(/width: ([^;]+)/)[1];
                            }, index * 100);
                        });
                    }
                });
            }, observerOptions);
            
            const analyticsSection = document.querySelector('.transfer-analytics');
            if (analyticsSection) {
                observer.observe(analyticsSection);
            }
            

            // Initialize all transfers on page load
            function initializeAllTransfers() {
                console.log('Initializing all transfers...');
                
                // Load all transfers for each category
                const categories = ['confirmed', 'rumors', 'done-deals', 'medical'];
                categories.forEach(category => {
                    loadAllTransfersForCategory(category);
                });
                
                console.log('All transfers loaded successfully!');
            }

            // Initialize all transfers when page loads
            initializeAllTransfers();
            
            // Update stats after loading all transfers
            updateTransferStats();

            // Animate probability bars on page load
            setTimeout(() => {
                const probabilityBars = document.querySelectorAll('.probability-bar');
                probabilityBars.forEach((bar, index) => {
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        const width = bar.style.width;
                        bar.style.width = '0%';
                        bar.style.transition = 'width 1.5s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)';
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            bar.style.width = width;
                        }, 50);
                    }, index * 200);
                });
            }, 1000);

            // Random live updates simulation
            const liveUpdates = [
                '🚨 BREAKING: Zubimendi medical scheduled for tomorrow',
                '✅ CONFIRMED: Palhinha deal announcement imminent',
                '📈 UPDATE: Son transfer probability increased to 82%',
                '💰 LATEST: Chelsea increase Hato bid by £5M',
                '🔥 HOT: Liverpool enter race for Darwin replacement'
            ];

            let updateIndex = 0;
            setInterval(() => {
                if (Math.random() > 0.7) { // 30% chance every 30 seconds
                    showNotification(liveUpdates[updateIndex % liveUpdates.length], 'info');
                    updateIndex++;
                }
            }, 30000);
        });

        // Social Sharing Functions
        function shareOnTwitter() {
            const url = encodeURIComponent(window.location.href);
            const text = encodeURIComponent('Check out the latest EPL Transfer Hub with live updates and probability tracker! 🔥⚽');
            window.open(`https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=${url}&text=${text}`, '_blank', 'width=550,height=420');
        }

        function shareOnFacebook() {
            const url = encodeURIComponent(window.location.href);
            window.open(`https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=${url}`, '_blank', 'width=555,height=400');
        }

        function shareOnLinkedIn() {
            const url = encodeURIComponent(window.location.href);
            const title = encodeURIComponent('EPL Transfer Hub - Live Updates');
            window.open(`https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=${url}&title=${title}`, '_blank', 'width=550,height=400');
        }

        function shareOnWhatsApp() {
            const url = encodeURIComponent(window.location.href);
            const text = encodeURIComponent('Check out the latest EPL transfers! ⚽');
            window.open(`https://api.whatsapp.com/send?text=${text} ${url}`, '_blank');
        }

        function copyToClipboard() {
            navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href).then(() => {
                showNotification('Link copied to clipboard! 📋', 'success');
            }).catch(() => {
                // Fallback for older browsers
                const tempInput = document.createElement('input');
                tempInput.value = window.location.href;
                document.body.appendChild(tempInput);
                tempInput.select();
                document.execCommand('copy');
                document.body.removeChild(tempInput);
                showNotification('Link copied to clipboard! 📋', 'success');
            });
        }

        // Enhanced Notification System
        function showNotification(message, type = 'info') {
            const container = document.getElementById('notification-container');
            if (!container) return;

            const notification = document.createElement('div');
            notification.className = `notification notification-${type}`;
            
            const typeIcons = {
                success: '✅',
                info: 'ℹ️',
                warning: '⚠️',
                error: '❌'
            };

            notification.innerHTML = `
                <span>${typeIcons[type] || 'ℹ️'}</span>
                <span>${message}</span>
            `;

            // Style based on type
            const typeColors = {
                success: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #4caf50, #66bb6a)',
                info: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #2196f3, #42a5f5)',
                warning: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #ff9800, #ffb74d)',
                error: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #f44336, #ef5350)'
            };

            notification.style.background = typeColors[type] || typeColors.info;
            container.appendChild(notification);

            // Auto remove after 4 seconds
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (notification && notification.parentNode) {
                    notification.style.animation = 'slideOutUp 0.5s ease';
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        if (notification.parentNode) {
                            notification.parentNode.removeChild(notification);
                        }
                    }, 500);
                }
            }, 4000);
        }

        // Enhanced Quick Actions for Transfer Cards
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            // Add quick action buttons to transfer cards
            const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
            transferCards.forEach(card => {
                card.classList.add('transfer-card-enhanced');
                
                // Add quick actions container
                const quickActions = document.createElement('div');
                quickActions.className = 'quick-actions';
                quickActions.innerHTML = `
                    <button class="quick-action-btn" onclick="toggleFavorite(this)" title="Add to Favorites">
                        <i class="far fa-heart"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button class="quick-action-btn" onclick="shareTransfer(this)" title="Share Transfer">
                        <i class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button class="quick-action-btn" onclick="setReminder(this)" title="Set Reminder">
                        <i class="far fa-bell"></i>
                    </button>
                `;
                card.appendChild(quickActions);
            });
        });

        // Quick Action Functions
        function toggleFavorite(btn) {
            const icon = btn.querySelector('i');
            const isFavorited = icon.classList.contains('fas');
            
            if (isFavorited) {
                icon.classList.remove('fas');
                icon.classList.add('far');
                showNotification('Removed from favorites', 'info');

            const card = btn.closest('.transfer-card');
            const playerName = card.querySelector('.player-name').textContent;
            const clubs = card.querySelector('.transfer-clubs').textContent.trim();
            
            const shareText = `${playerName} transfer update: ${clubs}`;
            
            if (navigator.share) {
                navigator.share({
                    title: 'EPL Transfer Update',
                    text: shareText,
                    url: window.location.href
                });
            } else {
                navigator.clipboard.writeText(`${shareText} - ${window.location.href}`);
                showNotification('Transfer details copied to clipboard!', 'success');
            }
        }

            icon.classList.remove('far');

            select2.innerHTML = '<option value="">Select second transfer...</option>';
            
            // Populate with all transfers
            Object.values(transferDatabase).flat().forEach((transfer, index) => {
                const option1 = new Option(`${transfer.player} (${transfer.fromClub} → ${transfer.toClub})`, index);
                const option2 = new Option(`${transfer.player} (${transfer.fromClub} → ${transfer.toClub})`, index);
                select1.add(option1);
                select2.add(option2);
            });
            
            // Enable compare button when both selects have values
            function checkCompareBtnState() {
                const canCompare = select1.value && select2.value && select1.value !== select2.value;
                compareBtn.disabled = !canCompare;

            select1.addEventListener('change', checkCompareBtnState);
            select2.addEventListener('change', checkCompareBtnState);
            
            compareBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (!this.disabled) {
                    performTransferComparison(select1.value, select2.value);

            });
        }
