toolUseResult.originalFile:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>EPL Transfer Hub - Latest Premier League Transfers | EPL News Hub</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Track all the latest Premier League transfers, rumors, and confirmed deals. Get real-time updates on player movements across all EPL clubs.">
    
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
    <link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="favicon.png">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0-beta3/css/all.min.css">
    
    <style>
        .transfer-hub-hero {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a 0%, #6b4c9a 50%, #8e6bb3 100%);
            padding: 80px 20px 40px;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .transfer-hub-hero::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            left: -50%;
            width: 200%;
            height: 200%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,255,255,0.05) 1px, transparent 1px);
            background-size: 50px 50px;
            animation: moveGrid 20s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes moveGrid {
            0% { transform: translate(0, 0); }
            100% { transform: translate(50px, 50px); }
        }
        
        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        
        .hero-title {
            font-size: 3.5em;
            font-weight: bold;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e, #ffd700);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            text-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.5);
            animation: glow 2s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
        }
        
        @keyframes glow {
            from { filter: brightness(1); }
            to { filter: brightness(1.2); }
        }
        
        .hero-subtitle {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            color: #ffffff;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            font-weight: 500;
        }
        
        .transfer-stats {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 40px;
            margin-top: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .stat-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            padding: 20px 30px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .stat-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
        }
        
        .stat-number {
            font-size: 2.5em;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #ffd700;
            display: block;
        }
        
        .stat-card .stat-label {
            font-size: 0.9em;
            color: #ffffff !important;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            opacity: 0.9;
            display: block;
            margin-top: 5px;
        }
        
        .transfer-controls {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto 20px;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .search-filter-container {
            display: flex;
            gap: 20px;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .search-box {
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 300px;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .search-box input {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 15px 50px 15px 20px;
            border: 2px solid #8e6bb3;
            border-radius: 50px;
            background: #ffffff;
            color: #333333;
            font-size: 1em;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .search-box input:focus {
            outline: none;
            border-color: #ffd700;
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .search-box i {
            position: absolute;
            right: 20px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            color: #ffd700;
            font-size: 1.2em;
        }
        
        .filter-buttons {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .filter-btn {
            padding: 12px 25px;
            border: 2px solid #8e6bb3;
            background: #ffffff;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            border-radius: 50px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        
        .filter-btn:hover {
            background: #8e6bb3;
            color: white;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        .filter-btn.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            border-color: #ffd700;
        }
        
        .transfer-categories {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 20px;
            margin-bottom: 40px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .category-tab {
            padding: 15px 35px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6b4c9a, #8e6bb3);
            border: 2px solid #ffd700;
            border-radius: 50px;
            color: white;
            font-weight: bold;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .category-tab::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: -100%;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3), transparent);
            transition: left 0.5s ease;
        }
        
        .category-tab:hover::before {
            left: 100%;
        }
        
        .category-tab.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            transform: scale(1.05);
        }
        
        .transfers-container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
            background: #f8f9fa;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 30px;
        }
        
        .transfer-section {
            display: none;
            animation: fadeIn 0.5s ease;
        }
        
        .transfer-section.active {
            display: block;
        }
        
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); }
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
        }

        /* Enhanced animations for new transfer cards */
        .transfer-card-new {
            animation: slideInUp 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) forwards;
        }

        @keyframes slideInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(30px) scale(0.95);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
            }
        }

        /* Pulse animation for live badge */
        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { transform: scale(1); }
            50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
            100% { transform: scale(1); }
        }

        @keyframes urgentPulse {
            0% { 
                transform: scale(1); 
                box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.3);
            }
            50% { 
                transform: scale(1.08); 
                box-shadow: 0 8px 30px rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.6);
            }
            100% { 
                transform: scale(1); 
                box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.3);
            }
        }

        /* Enhanced hover states for better polish */
        .transfer-fee:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }

        .player-name:hover {
            color: #ffd700;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }


        @keyframes loadingGradient {
            0% { background-position: 200% 0; }
            100% { background-position: -200% 0; }
        }

        /* Transfer Comparison Tool */
        .transfer-comparison-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .comparison-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .comparison-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }

        .comparison-controls {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 20px;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .comparison-selects {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 20px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .comparison-select {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            border: 2px solid #8e6bb3;
            border-radius: 25px;
            background: white;
            color: #333;
            font-size: 1em;
            min-width: 250px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .comparison-select:focus {
            outline: none;
            border-color: #ffd700;
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }

        .vs-indicator {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 1.2em;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }

        .compare-button {
            padding: 15px 40px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a, #6b4c9a);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 50px;
            font-size: 1.1em;
            font-weight: bold;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(74, 44, 122, 0.3);
        }

        .compare-button:hover:not(:disabled) {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(74, 44, 122, 0.4);
        }

        .compare-button:disabled {
            opacity: 0.5;
            cursor: not-allowed;
        }

        .comparison-results {
            display: none;
            margin-top: 30px;
        }

        .comparison-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 25px;
            padding: 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a, #6b4c9a);
            border-radius: 15px;
            color: white;
        }

        .export-comparison-btn {
            padding: 10px 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 20px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .export-comparison-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }

        .comparison-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr auto 1fr;
            gap: 30px;
            align-items: start;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .comparison-card.enhanced {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .comparison-card.enhanced:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
        }

        .player-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            padding-bottom: 15px;
            border-bottom: 2px solid #e9ecef;
        }

        .player-header h3 {
            margin: 0;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-size: 1.3em;
        }

        .position-badge {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 5px 12px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .detail-row {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
        }

        .detail-row.highlight {
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1);
            margin: 0 -15px;
            padding: 12px 15px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            border-bottom: none;
        }

        .detail-row .label {
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
        }

        .detail-row .value {
            font-weight: 500;
            color: #333;
        }

        .detail-row .value.fee {
            color: #ffd700;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 1.1em;
        }

        .performance-indicators {
            margin-top: 20px;
            padding-top: 20px;
            border-top: 2px solid #e9ecef;
        }

        .indicator {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .indicator-label {
            display: block;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .indicator-bar {
            background: #e9ecef;
            height: 8px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            overflow: hidden;
            position: relative;
        }

        .indicator-fill {
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: width 1.5s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
        }

        .indicator-value {
            position: absolute;
            right: 0;
            top: -20px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #ffd700;
        }

        .comparison-vs.enhanced {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border: 2px solid #ffd700;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
            min-height: 300px;
        }

        .vs-container {
            text-align: center;
        }

        .vs-icon {
            font-size: 3em;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .vs-verdict h4 {
            margin: 0 0 10px 0;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-size: 1.2em;
        }

        .vs-verdict p {
            margin: 0 0 20px 0;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }

        .comparison-stats {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 10px;
            width: 100%;
        }

        .stat {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1);
            border-radius: 8px;
        }

        .stat-label {
            font-size: 0.8em;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .stat-value {
            font-size: 0.8em;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        .comparison-charts {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(400px, 1fr));
            gap: 30px;
            margin-top: 30px;
        }

        .chart-container {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }

        .chart-container h4 {
            margin: 0 0 20px 0;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-size: 1.1em;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .chart-container canvas {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
        }

        /* Transfer Timeline */
        .transfer-timeline-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .timeline-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .timeline-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
        }

        .timeline-controls {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .timeline-filter {
            padding: 8px 16px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            border: 2px solid #8e6bb3;
            border-radius: 20px;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .timeline-filter.active,
        .timeline-filter:hover {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-color: #ffd700;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        .timeline-container {
            position: relative;
            padding: 20px 0;
        }

        .timeline-line {
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            top: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 4px;
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e, #ffd700);
            transform: translateX(-50%);
        }

        .timeline-event {
            display: flex;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            position: relative;
        }

        .timeline-event:nth-child(even) {
            flex-direction: row-reverse;
        }

        .timeline-event-content {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 15px;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 45%;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .timeline-event-content:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
        }

        .timeline-event-dot {
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            top: 20px;
            width: 16px;
            height: 16px;
            background: #ffd700;
            border: 4px solid white;
            border-radius: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px #ffd700;
        }

        /* Advanced Filters Panel */
        .advanced-filters-panel {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            right: -400px;
            width: 400px;
            height: 100vh;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            box-shadow: -5px 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            z-index: 1003;
            transition: right 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
            overflow-y: auto;
        }

        .advanced-filters-panel.active {
            right: 0;
        }

        .filters-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 20px;
            border-bottom: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a, #6b4c9a);
            color: white;
        }

        .filters-header h3 {
            margin: 0;
            font-size: 1.3em;
        }

        .close-filters {
            background: none;
            border: none;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1.5em;
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 5px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            transition: background 0.3s ease;
        }

        .close-filters:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
        }

        .filters-grid {
            padding: 20px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 25px;
        }

        .filter-group label {
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #4a2c7a;
        }

        .range-slider {
            position: relative;
            margin: 15px 0;
        }

        .range-slider input[type="range"] {
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 5px;
            background: none;
            pointer-events: none;
            -webkit-appearance: none;
        }

        .range-slider input[type="range"]::-webkit-slider-thumb {
            height: 20px;
            width: 20px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: #ffd700;
            cursor: pointer;
            border: 3px solid white;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            pointer-events: auto;
            -webkit-appearance: none;
        }

        .range-values {
            text-align: center;
            margin-top: 20px;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .age-range {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .age-range input {
            padding: 8px 12px;
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 10px;
            width: 80px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .checkbox-group {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .checkbox-group label {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            font-weight: normal;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .filters-actions {
            padding: 20px;
            border-top: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            display: flex;
            gap: 15px;
        }

        .apply-filters-btn,
        .reset-filters-btn {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 12px;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 25px;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .apply-filters-btn {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
        }

        .reset-filters-btn {
            background: #6c757d;
            color: white;
        }

        .apply-filters-btn:hover,
        .reset-filters-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }

        /* Transfer Insights */
        .transfer-insights-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .insights-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .insights-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
        }

        .toggle-advanced-filters {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a, #6b4c9a);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .toggle-advanced-filters:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(74, 44, 122, 0.3);
        }

        .insights-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }

        .insight-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 20px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }

        .insight-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
        }

        .insight-icon {
            font-size: 2.5em;
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-radius: 50%;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .insight-content h4 {
            margin: 0 0 8px 0;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-size: 1.1em;
        }

        .insight-content p {
            margin: 0 0 8px 0;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }

        .insight-trend {
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 0.9em;
        }

        .insight-trend.positive {
            color: #28a745;
        }

        .insight-detail {
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 4px 10px;
            border-radius: 12px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            font-weight: 600;
            display: inline-block;
        }

        /* Watchlist Section */
        .watchlist-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .watchlist-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .watchlist-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
        }

        .watchlist-controls {
            display: flex;
            gap: 15px;
            align-items: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .add-to-watchlist-btn {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #28a745, #34ce57);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .add-to-watchlist-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(40, 167, 69, 0.3);
        }

        .watchlist-sort select {
            padding: 10px 15px;
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 20px;
            background: white;
            color: #333;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .watchlist-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }

        .empty-watchlist {
            grid-column: 1 / -1;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 60px 20px;
            color: #6c757d;
        }

        .empty-watchlist i {
            font-size: 4em;
            color: #8e6bb3;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        /* Alerts Section */
        .alerts-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .alerts-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .alerts-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
        }

        .setup-alerts-btn {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b, #ff8787);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .setup-alerts-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.3);
        }

        .alerts-preview {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }

        .alert-example {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 15px;
            padding: 20px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }

        .alert-example:hover {
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
        }

        .alert-type {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .alert-content {
            color: #6c757d;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }

        /* Mobile Optimizations */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .advanced-filters-panel {
                width: 100%;
                right: -100%;
            }

            .comparison-selects {
                flex-direction: column;
                width: 100%;
            }

            .comparison-select {
                width: 100%;
                min-width: auto;
            }

            .vs-indicator {
                order: -1;
            }

            .timeline-line {
                left: 20px;
            }

            .timeline-event-content {
                width: calc(100% - 60px);
                margin-left: 60px;
            }

            .timeline-event:nth-child(even) .timeline-event-content {
                margin-left: 60px;
            }

            .timeline-event-dot {
                left: 20px;
            }

            .insights-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }

            .insight-card {
                flex-direction: column;
                text-align: center;
            }
        }
        
        .transfers-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(350px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
            margin-bottom: 40px;
        }
        
        .transfer-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff 0%, #f8f9fa 100%);
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            transition: all 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }
        
        .transfer-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -2px;
            left: -2px;
            right: -2px;
            bottom: -2px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-radius: 20px;
            opacity: 0;
            z-index: -1;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
            background-size: 400% 400%;
            animation: gradientShift 3s ease infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes gradientShift {
            0% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
            50% { background-position: 100% 50%; }
            100% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
        }
        
        .transfer-card:hover::before {
            opacity: 1;
        }
        
        .transfer-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.25);
        }
        
        .transfer-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: start;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        .transfer-clubs {
            flex: 1;
            color: #333333;
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        
        .club-badge {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-right: 10px;
        }
        
        .transfer-arrow {
            color: #ffd700;
            margin: 0 15px;
            font-size: 1.2em;
        }
        
        .transfer-fee {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 5px 15px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 0.9em;
        }
        
        .player-info {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }
        
        .player-name {
            font-size: 1.3em;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }
        
        .player-position {
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
        }
        
        .transfer-details {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding-top: 15px;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }
        
        .transfer-date {
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
        }
        
        .transfer-status {
            padding: 5px 12px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            font-size: 0.85em;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-transform: uppercase;
        }
        
        .status-confirmed {
            background: rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.2);
            color: #4caf50;
            border: 1px solid #4caf50;
        }
        
        .status-rumor {
            background: rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.2);
            color: #ff9800;
            border: 1px solid #ff9800;
        }
        
        .status-medical {
            background: rgba(33, 150, 243, 0.2);
            color: #2196f3;
            border: 1px solid #2196f3;
        }
        
        
        .no-results {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 60px 20px;
            color: #6c757d;
        }
        
        .no-results i {
            font-size: 4em;
            color: #8e6bb3;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        /* Transfer Countdown Timer */
        .transfer-countdown-section {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b, #ff8787);
            padding: 30px 20px;
            margin: 30px 0;
        }
        
        .countdown-container {
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .countdown-title {
            color: white;
            font-size: 1.5em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 2px;
        }
        
        .countdown-timer {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .time-unit {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            min-width: 100px;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .time-unit:hover {
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        
        .time-value {
            display: block;
            font-size: 3em;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #ff6b6b;
            line-height: 1;
        }
        
        .time-label {
            display: block;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            color: #666;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            margin-top: 10px;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
        }
        
        /* Live Transfer Ticker */
        .transfer-ticker-section {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a, #6b4c9a);
            padding: 15px 0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        
        .ticker-header {
            position: absolute;
            left: 20px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            z-index: 10;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            background: transparent;
            padding-right: 20px;
        }
        
        .ticker-badge {
            background: #ff0000;
            color: white;
            padding: 5px 10px;
            border-radius: 5px;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            animation: pulse 1.5s infinite;
        }
        
        .ticker-title {
            color: white;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.9em;
        }
        
        .ticker-wrapper {
            overflow: hidden;
            padding-left: 250px;
        }
        
        .ticker-content {
            display: flex;
            animation: scroll 30s linear infinite;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }
        
        .ticker-item {
            color: #ffd700;
            padding: 0 50px;
            font-size: 1em;
            font-weight: 500;
        }
        
        @keyframes scroll {
            0% { transform: translateX(0); }
            100% { transform: translateX(-50%); }
        }
        
        /* Advanced Filters */
        .advanced-filters {
            display: flex;
            gap: 15px;
            margin-top: 20px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            align-items: center;
        }
        
        .filter-select {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            border: 2px solid #8e6bb3;
            background: #ffffff;
            color: #333333;
            border-radius: 50px;
            font-size: 1em;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            min-width: 150px;
        }
        
        .filter-select:hover {
            background: #8e6bb3;
            color: white;
            border-color: #ffd700;
        }
        
        .filter-select:focus {
            outline: none;
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .reset-filters-btn {
            padding: 12px 25px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b, #ff8787);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 50px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }
        
        .reset-filters-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.4);
        }
        
        /* Club View Toggle */
        .view-toggle {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 10px;
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        
        .view-btn {
            padding: 10px 20px;
            background: #6b4c9a;
            color: white;
            border: 2px solid #ffd700;
            border-radius: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .view-btn.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
        }
        
        /* Transfer Analytics Section */
        .transfer-analytics {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .analytics-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        
        .analytics-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        
        .analytics-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }
        
        .analytics-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6b4c9a, #8e6bb3);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            border: 2px solid rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        
        .analytics-card h4 {
            color: #ffd700;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            font-size: 1.2em;
        }
        
        .club-spending-list {
            list-style: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        
        .club-spending-item {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: 10px 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .spending-bar {
            height: 8px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-radius: 4px;
            margin-top: 5px;
            transition: width 1s ease;
        }
        
        /* Transfer Probability Tracker */
        .transfer-probability-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .probability-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        
        .probability-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
        }
        
        .probability-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(350px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }
        
        .probability-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
            transition: all 0.4s ease;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .probability-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            height: 4px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #4caf50, #8bc34a, #ffc107, #ff9800, #f44336);
            background-size: 200% 100%;
            animation: probabilityGradient 3s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes probabilityGradient {
            0% { background-position: 200% 0; }
            100% { background-position: -200% 0; }
        }
        
        .probability-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
        }
        
        .probability-header-info {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        .probability-clubs {
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        
        .probability-percentage {
            font-size: 1.8em;
            font-weight: 900;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4caf50, #66bb6a);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
        }
        
        .probability-bar-container {
            background: #e9ecef;
            height: 12px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            overflow: hidden;
            margin: 15px 0;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .probability-bar {
            height: 100%;
            border-radius: 6px;
            transition: width 1.5s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .probability-bar::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
            animation: shimmer 2s infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes shimmer {
            0% { transform: translateX(-100%); }
            100% { transform: translateX(100%); }
        }
        
        .probability-high { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #4caf50, #66bb6a); }
        .probability-medium { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffc107, #ffeb3b); }
        .probability-low { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff9800, #ffb74d); }
        .probability-unlikely { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #f44336, #ef5350); }
        
        .probability-factors {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 8px;
            margin-top: 15px;
        }
        
        .factor-tag {
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 4px 10px;
            border-radius: 12px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            font-weight: 500;
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        /* Social Sharing Section */
        .social-sharing {
            position: fixed;
            right: 20px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            z-index: 1000;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 15px;
        }
        
        .share-btn {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: white;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .share-btn::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), transparent);
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .share-btn:hover::before {
            opacity: 1;
            animation: shine 0.6s ease;
        }
        
        @keyframes shine {
            0% { transform: translateX(-100%) rotate(45deg); }
            100% { transform: translateX(100%) rotate(45deg); }
        }
        
        .share-twitter { background: #1da1f2; }
        .share-facebook { background: #4267b2; }
        .share-linkedin { background: #0077b5; }
        .share-whatsapp { background: #25d366; }
        .share-copy { background: #6c757d; }
        
        .share-btn:hover {
            transform: scale(1.1);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
        }
        
        /* Enhanced Transfer Cards with Interactive Elements */
        .transfer-card-enhanced {
            position: relative;
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        
        .transfer-card-enhanced .quick-actions {
            position: absolute;
            top: 15px;
            right: 15px;
            display: flex;
            gap: 8px;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .transfer-card-enhanced:hover .quick-actions {
            opacity: 1;
        }
        
        .quick-action-btn {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            border: none;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            color: #4a2c7a;
        }
        
        .quick-action-btn:hover {
            background: #ffd700;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        
        /* Transfer News Feed */
        .transfer-news-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .news-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 25px;
        }
        
        .news-title {
            font-size: 1.8em;
            color: #ffd700;
            font-weight: bold;
        }
        
        /* Live Updates Badge */
        .live-updates-badge {
            position: fixed;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b, #ff8787);
            color: white;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            border-radius: 25px;
            font-weight: 600;
            z-index: 1001;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.3);
            animation: pulse 2s infinite;
        }
        
        .live-updates-badge::before {
            content: '🔴';
            margin-right: 8px;
        }
        
        /* Interactive Filter Chips */
        .filter-chips {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .filter-chip {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            border: 2px solid #8e6bb3;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 8px 16px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            font-weight: 500;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .filter-chip::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: -100%;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3), transparent);
            transition: left 0.5s ease;
        }
        
        .filter-chip:hover::before {
            left: 100%;
        }
        
        .filter-chip.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-color: #ffd700;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .filter-chip .chip-count {
            background: rgba(74, 44, 122, 0.1);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 2px 8px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            margin-left: 8px;
        }
        
        /* Enhanced Analytics with Charts */
        .analytics-chart-container {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6b4c9a, #8e6bb3);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .analytics-chart-container::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            left: -50%;
            width: 200%;
            height: 200%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,255,255,0.03) 1px, transparent 1px);
            background-size: 20px 20px;
            animation: movePattern 15s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes movePattern {
            0% { transform: translate(0, 0) rotate(0deg); }
            100% { transform: translate(20px, 20px) rotate(360deg); }
        }
        
        .chart-placeholder {
            height: 200px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 10px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: #ffd700;
            font-size: 1.2em;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        
        /* Notification System */
        .notification-container {
            position: fixed;
            top: 20px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            z-index: 1002;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        
        .notification {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4caf50, #66bb6a);
            color: white;
            padding: 15px 25px;
            border-radius: 25px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.3);
            animation: slideInDown 0.5s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        
        @keyframes slideInDown {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(-50px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        
        /* Advanced Mobile Enhancements */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .social-sharing {
                position: static;
                transform: none;
                flex-direction: row;
                justify-content: center;
                margin: 20px 0;
            }
            
            .probability-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .filter-chips {
                justify-content: center;
            }
            
            .live-updates-badge {
                top: auto;
                bottom: 20px;
                left: 50%;
                transform: translateX(-50%);
                right: auto;
            }
        }
        
        .news-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(350px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }
        
        .news-card {
            background: #ffffff;
            border-radius: 15px;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }
        
        .news-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
        }
        
        .news-image {
            width: 100%;
            height: 200px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #8e6bb3, #b19cd9);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 3em;
        }
        
        .news-content {
            padding: 20px;
        }
        
        .news-category {
            background: #ffd700;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 5px 10px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            font-weight: 600;
            display: inline-block;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        
        .news-headline {
            color: #333333;
            font-size: 1.1em;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }
        
        .news-meta {
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .hero-title {
                font-size: 2.5em;
            }
            
            .transfers-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .transfer-stats {
                gap: 20px;
            }
            
            .stat-card {
                padding: 15px 20px;
            }
            
            .category-tab {
                padding: 10px 20px;
                font-size: 0.9em;
            }
            
            .ticker-header {
                position: relative;
                left: 0;
                transform: none;
                padding: 10px 20px;
                justify-content: center;
            }
            
            .ticker-wrapper {
                padding-left: 20px;
            }
            
            .time-unit {
                min-width: 70px;
                padding: 15px 10px;
            }
            
            .time-value {
                font-size: 2em;
            }
            
            .advanced-filters {
                flex-direction: column;
                width: 100%;
            }
            
            .filter-select {
                width: 100%;
            }
        }

        /* Enhanced Transfer Hub Styles */
        .search-highlight {
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #333;
            padding: 2px 4px;
            border-radius: 3px;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .value-indicator {
            margin-top: 8px;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9fa, #e9ecef);
            border-radius: 6px;
            border-left: 3px solid #38003c;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
        }

        .market-value {
            display: block;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #333;
            margin-bottom: 4px;
        }

        .value-change {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 4px;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .value-change.up {
            color: #28a745;
        }

        .value-change.down {
            color: #dc3545;
        }

        .timeline-item {
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .timeline-item:hover {
            background: rgba(56, 0, 60, 0.05);
            border-radius: 8px;
        }

        .timeline-item.expanded {
            background: rgba(56, 0, 60, 0.08);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 16px;
        }

        .timeline-details {
            margin-top: 12px;
            padding: 12px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
            border-radius: 6px;
            border-left: 3px solid #38003c;
        }

        .detail-item {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            color: #555;
        }

        .detail-item:last-child {
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }

        .detail-item i {
            color: #38003c;
            width: 16px;
        }

        .notification-container {
            position: fixed;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            z-index: 10000;
            max-width: 350px;
        }

        .live-notification {
            background: white;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            transform: translateX(100%);
            animation: slideIn 0.3s ease forwards;
            border-left: 4px solid #38003c;
        }

        .live-notification.high {
            border-left-color: #dc3545;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fff5f5, #ffffff);
        }

        .live-notification.medium {
            border-left-color: #ffc107;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fffbf0, #ffffff);
        }

        .live-notification.low {
            border-left-color: #17a2b8;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f0f9ff, #ffffff);
        }

        .notification-content {
            padding: 12px 16px;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .notification-message {
            flex: 1;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            color: #333;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .notification-close {
            background: none;
            border: none;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            color: #999;
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 0;
            margin-left: 12px;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .notification-close:hover {
            color: #333;
        }

        .live-notification.fade-out {
            animation: slideOut 0.3s ease forwards;
        }

        @keyframes slideIn {
            from { transform: translateX(100%); opacity: 0; }
            to { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; }
        }

        @keyframes slideOut {
            from { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; }
            to { transform: translateX(100%); opacity: 0; }
        }

        .search-results-indicator {
            margin: 20px 0;
            padding: 15px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9fa, #e9ecef);
            border-radius: 8px;
            border-left: 4px solid #38003c;
        }

        .results-info {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            color: #555;
        }

        .results-info i {
            color: #38003c;
        }

        .clear-search {
            background: #38003c;
            color: white;
            border: none;
            padding: 6px 12px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            margin-left: auto;
        }

        .clear-search:hover {
            background: #4a1a4e;
        }

        .transfer-card {
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .transfer-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(56, 0, 60, 0.15);
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .notification-container {
                top: 10px;
                right: 10px;
                left: 10px;
                max-width: none;
            }

            .live-notification {
                transform: translateY(-100%);
                animation: slideInMobile 0.3s ease forwards;
            }

            .live-notification.fade-out {
                animation: slideOutMobile 0.3s ease forwards;
            }

            @keyframes slideInMobile {
                from { transform: translateY(-100%); opacity: 0; }
                to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
            }

            @keyframes slideOutMobile {
                from { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
                to { transform: translateY(-100%); opacity: 0; }
            }

            .value-indicator {
                font-size: 0.8rem;
                padding: 6px 10px;
            }

            .timeline-details {
                padding: 10px;
            }

            .detail-item {
                font-size: 0.85rem;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Include Header -->
    <div include="./header.html"></div>

    <!-- Live Updates Badge -->
    <div class="live-updates-badge">
        Live Updates
    </div>

    <!-- Social Sharing -->
    <div class="social-sharing">
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-twitter" onclick="shareOnTwitter()" title="Share on Twitter">
            <i class="fab fa-twitter"></i>
        </a>
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-facebook" onclick="shareOnFacebook()" title="Share on Facebook">
            <i class="fab fa-facebook-f"></i>
        </a>
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-linkedin" onclick="shareOnLinkedIn()" title="Share on LinkedIn">
            <i class="fab fa-linkedin-in"></i>
        </a>
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-whatsapp" onclick="shareOnWhatsApp()" title="Share on WhatsApp">
            <i class="fab fa-whatsapp"></i>
        </a>
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-copy" onclick="copyToClipboard()" title="Copy Link">
            <i class="fas fa-link"></i>
        </a>
    </div>

    <!-- Notification Container -->
    <div class="notification-container" id="notification-container"></div>

    <div class="transfer-hub-hero">
        <div class="hero-content">
            <h1 class="hero-title">EPL Transfer Hub</h1>
            <p class="hero-subtitle">Track every move in the Premier League transfer market</p>
            <div class="transfer-stats">
                <div class="stat-card">
                    <span class="stat-number">53</span>
                    <span class="stat-label">Total Transfers</span>
                </div>
                <div class="stat-card">
                    <span class="stat-number">£2.1B</span>
                    <span class="stat-label">Total Spent</span>
                </div>
                <div class="stat-card">
                    <span class="stat-number">20</span>
                    <span class="stat-label">Confirmed Deals</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Transfer Window Countdown Timer -->
    <div class="transfer-countdown-section">
        <div class="countdown-container">
            <h3 class="countdown-title">⏰ Transfer Window Closes In:</h3>
            <div class="countdown-timer" id="countdown-timer">
                <div class="time-unit">
                    <span class="time-value" id="days">00</span>
                    <span class="time-label">Days</span>
                </div>
                <div class="time-unit">
                    <span class="time-value" id="hours">00</span>
                    <span class="time-label">Hours</span>
                </div>
                <div class="time-unit">
                    <span class="time-value" id="minutes">00</span>
                    <span class="time-label">Minutes</span>
                </div>
                <div class="time-unit">
                    <span class="time-value" id="seconds">00</span>
                    <span class="time-label">Seconds</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
    // Inline countdown script - runs immediately after HTML elements are created
    (function() {
        console.log('Inline countdown script starting...');
        
        function updateCountdownNow() {
            // September 1, 2025 at 7:00 PM
            const deadline = new Date('2025-09-01T19:00:00').getTime();
            const now = Date.now();
            const timeLeft = deadline - now;
            
            if (timeLeft <= 0) {
                document.getElementById('days').innerHTML = '00';
                document.getElementById('hours').innerHTML = '00';
                document.getElementById('minutes').innerHTML = '00';
                document.getElementById('seconds').innerHTML = '00';
                console.log('Transfer window closed');
                return;
            }
            
            const days = Math.floor(timeLeft / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
            const hours = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60));
            const minutes = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
            const seconds = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);
            
            // Force update using innerHTML
            const daysEl = document.getElementById('days');
            const hoursEl = document.getElementById('hours');
            const minutesEl = document.getElementById('minutes');
            const secondsEl = document.getElementById('seconds');
            
            if (daysEl) daysEl.innerHTML = String(days).padStart(2, '0');
            if (hoursEl) hoursEl.innerHTML = String(hours).padStart(2, '0');
            if (minutesEl) minutesEl.innerHTML = String(minutes).padStart(2, '0');
            if (secondsEl) secondsEl.innerHTML = String(seconds).padStart(2, '0');
            
            console.log(`Inline countdown: ${days}d ${hours}h ${minutes}m ${seconds}s`);
        }
        
        // Start immediately
        updateCountdownNow();
        
        // Update every second
        setInterval(updateCountdownNow, 1000);
        
        console.log('Inline countdown started successfully');
    })();
    </script>
